## Loading the data
```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda")
```

```{r}
library(individuals)
Women<-individuals %>%
  filter(cmte_id == "C00473918"| 
         cmte_id == "C00530766",
         transaction_dt >= "01012012" & 
         transaction_dt <= "12312012",
         entity_type == "IND")

Donations<- contributions %>%
  filter(cmte_id == "C00473918"| 
         cmte_id == "C00530766",
         transaction_type == "24A")


join from candidates data the candidate name that identifies the cand_id number
```
